title: Problem when queuing up; don't get notification when I'm in a lobby
body:
Hello

I've been having this problem for a few months already:

When I queue up for a game, with friends or by myself, sometimes I don't get the notification that a game has been found. The other players get the message that I have not accepted the game. Today, I even lost LP and had a time penalty because apparently I dodged a game; in fact it never showed up on my client and it was still showing that I was searching for a game.

Can anyone help with this?

Thank you

replies.body:
The queue notification operates on the PvP.net platform. If your connection to that platform isn't great, it could prevent you from getting notifications from it or prevent you from matchmaking entirely. Since this operates on a network connection, the most common cause for a poor connection to it are incompatible network settings. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
